EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 7 - Zero emissions White Paper
EmailTemplate.subject: Turn your zero-carbon vision into business opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Carbon-free radio access networks. Good for business. Good for the planet. Zero Emission Solution <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200830]]> Adopt the latest energy-saving technologies to cut OPEX More operators are committing to cutting emissions. Begin your journey now, set long term goals and aim for zero carbon, while also boosting your business and adding brand value. Read the white paper <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200830]]> ► Reducing carbon emissions saves you money and contributes to limiting global warming to less than 2°C.
The Nokia Zero Emission Solution applies multiple technology advances in software, hardware and renewable energy to modernize your base station sites:
- AirScale Base Stations use 60 percent less hardware, dramatically cutting energy use and total costs - New software reduces base station energy consumption further and even uses zero energy when there is no traffic © 2016 Nokia. Contact Us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Terms of Use <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/terms]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
